values: heather comes home today. thank god. the road ahead will be very stressful but there is no doubt in my head that we can handle anything now. im not sure how much longer i will keep this journal. i dont ever use it. we will see
does anybody else think the song Night Moves by Bob Seger is totally amazing?
goddamnit, please come home. this place is very hollow without you. this apartment and myself.
frat parties arent at all what i expected.
it feels like im wasting my days away
today, i laid face down on the floor and listened to bruce springsteen.  i did this for about 2 hours. The Boss seems to have all the answers

i never thought a tracy chapman song would make me cry


If you wait for me 
then I'll come for you
Although I've traveled far
I always hold a place for you in my heart

If you think of me
If you miss me once in awhile
Then I'll return to you
I'll return and fill that space in your heart 

Remembering
Your touch
Your kiss
Your warm embrace
I'll find my way back to you
If you'll be waiting

If you dream of me 
like I dream of you
In a place that's warm and dark
In a place where I can feel the beating of your heart 

Remembering
Your touch
Your kiss
Your warm embrace
I'll find my way back to you
If you'll be waiting

I've longed for you 
And I have desired
To see your face your smile
To be with you wherever you are 

Remembering
Your touch
Your kiss
Your warm embrace
I'll find my way back to you
Please say you'll be waiting 

Together again
It would feel so good to be
In your arms
Where all my journeys end
If you can make a promise 
If it's one that you can keep
I vow to come for you
If you wait for me 

And say you'll hold
A place for me 
in your heart.
i wish my fucking tax check would get here

im on nobodies side and i love all my friends. all of this needs to stop. for reals yo.

shea made me feel so much better about heather leaving. i will count this as a blessing instead of a sad event. im hoping she will come back with so much more than she has. on all levels.

i have to do laundry. therefore i am wearing shorts today.:( 

i have this weekend off and i am going to relax. watch the super bowl on sunday and cousy up with heather. GO COLTS!

i hope my taxes come back soon. new tire, probably new glasses, anddddd?????? who knows.

im going to do dishes.
invader zim has taken over my life

The days are closing in, and in my mind I begin to picture her hand waving goodbye to me. Its consuming me, and I wish I could think about her arrival instead of her departure. We need this. She needs this. I need to be strong and just deal with it. I will be surronded by her clothes, the remnants of her scent, and the animals she loves so much. Be strong. Be strong. Be strong. Be strong. 
I will send you away with kisses and greet you with fireworks my love.

my christmas was pretty damn good. i received a dvd/ vhs player which also records my vhs tapes into dvds. i got some minutes for my phone and a some cash flow. it was so nice to be with my family and heather. 
i know the days are closing in on when she will be leaving and its killing me. i think this will be one of the hardest things to deal with, but i am prepared and ready.
new years eve was filled with Monster House, the ball dropping, and rockos modern life. couldnt of been better. i really dont get why people feel the need to drink/or get drunk. i understand some people have a problem but some people are just lame about it. 
i think i might be going to bens tonight. we will see.
i still get butterflys in my stomach when i look at her...

money is stressing me out so much right now. im trying not to let it but its hard. this christmas will be one of little gifts given and received for me. hopefully after christmas i will be able to make up for it. 
my heather is getting nervous about the guard. i really truely believe she can do this and she needs to prove to herself she can. she needs some kind words her way. so send em. im proud of her in so many ways.

i just would like to tell my best friend that i am here for her and i always will be. i know you think we havent been as close as we used to be, but i have never for a second doubted my friendship with you. i will help you see this through.

i had the most awesome night with 2 of my best friends.

lunch today with them too. 

tomorrow turkey which i have been eagerly waiting for all year.

i miss my girrrrrllyfriend
stealing your neighbors internet is soooo awesome

my apartment is badass. so is my cat.
drop by sometime

my girlfriend got the most amazing tattoo ever..yeah that right.
tomorrow its my turn

top 5 things i want to happen ASAP

5. start budgeting money
4. get caught up on my comic book reading
3. buy a sega genesis
2. move out and get settled
1. heather to be happy with herself and completely in love with me


#1 is kind of two things, but oh well. i wouldnt care if just #1 happened. its that important to me. i sense good things inthe future though.

september 24th is heathers birthday:)

Today won't be like yesterday
The bell tolls for an hour straight
Screaming mothers chase their children down
Fathers tear out their eyes
As the city topples to the ground 

Outside the streets are in a panic
Truth sellers jump from tall, tall ledges
No sign of Christ with a sword in his mouth
Beneath the blood red sky I'll sit and laugh with you tonight

This is a promise I made to you
I'll be right there
I'll be right next to you

When the trumpets blare the loudest and cannons roar
All the trains that once came for you
Spill off the tracks floor
All your horrors they multiply
And you realize your fears
I'll block your ears with both of my hands
Kiss away the tears

When the armageddon's been locked and loaded
I will come back for you...


i love this song so much

she wants a break. i want to light myself on fire or find something to take my mind off of the complete emptiness i feel.

good night
pickle fest was so fun. yeah i know, we are fucking 60.

i am so happy. she is so happy. together we are what we always wanted to be. happy. things are going really good right now. 
im glad my best friend is just as awkward as i am:)

life is good right now. 

i have kittens in my bathroom.

july 29th detroit warped tour=yum


im going to see tristans band tomorrow. im excited. my g/f and i are good incase kate or cashana are reading. sssssstttalkers.


amys wedding is coming up. im pretty pumped for that. i hope they have lots of odouls.
god i miss her already im a mess

I'll be quiet to keep you quiet.
Don't concern yourself with my slow dying.
Through the vents I hear you sigh.
I don't get too high these days.
Your floor is my ceiling.
Lights out, you can't come in.
If you don't remind me, I won't forget you.
If you don't ask, I won't upset you.
I am jet black.
I am stone cold.
Jet black to the center.
Funny like a funeral.
I need you to bury me.
White noise in black room dust.
These hands long for one last touch.
Hourglass all out of trust.
I don't scratch so I won't itch.
I don't reach so I won't miss.
I taste our last kiss.
This is the cure: the same as the symptom.
Simple and pure: break to keep fixing.
Patiently nurse, patient and nurse.
This is the part I wouldn't show you.
The part where you say, "I don't even know you."
This is your cue.
Be glad it's through.

if you havent ever listened to jawbreaker you are a loser.  the song jet black is one of the best songs i have ever heard
when you're gone...colors seem to fade

im trying to get a 2nd job. anybody have any ideas?

p.s i had an amazing time sunday with my girlfriend
things will get better. i believe in her
may my head rest well here. portland here we come. oh and i think im going on a 2 day fast. not because of weight issues, but im going to clean out my system.

adios

im going on a well deserved camping trip with heathurr. be back sunday. im sure noone will miss me. opps. that was very heather fettish huh. sorry

heathurr and i went to south haven yesterday. i got to meet her friends alex and katie, whom i thought were very friend worthy people. we also took a walk down the pier to the light house and just took in the beautiful atmosphere. the water looked beautiful, people were splashing and playing on the beach, and the fips were out enjoying there million dollar houses and outrageous boats. i didnt think paradise would be located so close to indiana. all and all it was a good trip to south haven. heathurr took me to some of the stores around there seemed real excited to be there with me. which we needed. we had one argument that escalated to more then we should of let it, but i think both of us are going to be more aware of the things that we do to make it escalate like that. i love that girl so much and the trip really made me happy. i wouldnt of wanted to be there with anyone else but her.
heathurr also took me the The Zoo. a gay bar in kalamazoo. we showed up pretty early and just sat and talked. eventually people started rolling in and my disgust for people started to kick in and i just felt sick to my stomach seeing all the people trying soooo hard and acting so cool. heathurr and i just sat back and people watched and seriously i was with the hottest girl there. gay bars=lame.
before we fell asleep that night we talked. which is getting to be routine for us which is nice. i like going to bed knowing we chizzled away at a little of the uncertainty each night. before i may have been a big manipulator and all about myself but i have never wanted to set anything straight in my life more then this. 
"ive looked around enough to know, that you're the one i wanna go thru time with"


im going to get my fishing license and maybe go out to eat with allison. god, do i miss the person who makes me feel better with just her precense.

if only im sorry was a stronger phrase.

i love you sooo much.

she looks so beautiful right now. laying in our bed. i almost dont wanna crawl in because i dont want to wake her. this is happiness. i dont care if i never make another dollar in my life, i am so happy. no annomous comment will ruin that either. but if it makes you feel better go ahead and leave one. its entertaining ill give you that.


i love her
